mapper.update: update dingdinfo set d_num = #{dNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, consign = #{consign,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price_type = #{priceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evaluate = #{evaluate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where dingd_id = #{dingdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select dingd_id, d_num, state, price, consign, price_type, evaluate, create_time, update_time from dingdinfo where dingd_id = #{dingdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select dingd_id, d_num, state, price, consign, price_type, evaluate, create_time, update_time from dingdinfo
